subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oh Bruce...
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Believe it or not, someone asked me some years ago if I'd like to have 
some of those papers and notes.  They were for real.  The gummint was 
evidently getting rid of some of them. Like a fool I declined.

Zack

On Fri, 16 Nov 2007, Frank Ratka wrote:

> Tell yourself whatever makes you feel better or whatever allows you to 
> sleep at night. Also, you may want to research into Tesla a bit more. He 
> did not die poor! He died while living in an upscale hotel (the New 
> Yorker) in NY, NY. Immediately after his death, all of his belongings, 
> papers and research were confiscated by the US government. The debt's 
> that were attributed to him (and the reason why people thought he was 
> poor) were with the very man that ruined his reputation, George 
> Westinghouse.
>
> Frank R.
